title: thevoyager23
author: thevoyager23
content: Sorry for noob question here but im going crazy trying to find this option, sp the chart adjusts and fits screen automatically when you switch from 5d to 1h etc....

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: thevoyager23 on May 09, 2022, 06:26:17 PMSorry for noob question here but im going crazy trying to find this option, sp the chart adjusts and fits screen automatically when you switch from 5d to 1h etc.... Hover over the vertical or y-axis [depending on where you've pinned it, it's either on the left or right of the screen] > your cursor would change to an up-down arrow > right-click > tick the "Auto (fits data to screen)" option.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.created_time: May 12, 2022, 12:12:01 AMLast edit: July 19, 2023, 08:33:10 PM by logfiles
comments.body: Alternatively, adding to what @SFR10 said, there is a "Toggle Auto Scale" button on the bottom right of the Chart, right after the % and Log scale buttons. Click on it (Auto). Once it turns blue, it means the auto-fit mode is active.
